briefdescription.para: Accepts a visitor.

detaileddescription.para: Enumerates over this node and all of its children. Each node calls a corresponding method on DocumentVisitor.
For more info see the Visitor design pattern.

briefdescription.para: Creates a duplicate of the node.

detaileddescription.para: This method serves as a copy constructor for nodes. The cloned node has no parent, but belongs to the same document as the original node.
This method always performs a deep copy of the node. The isCloneChildren parameter specifies whether to perform copy all child nodes as well.

briefdescription.para: Specifies custom node identifier.

detaileddescription.para: Default is zero.
This identifier can be set and used arbitrarily. For example, as a key to get external data.
Important note, specified value is not saved to an output file and exists only during the node lifetime.

briefdescription.para: Gets the document to which this node belongs.

detaileddescription.para: The node always belongs to a document even if it has just been created and not yet added to the tree, or if it has been removed from the tree.

briefdescription.para: Returns true if this node can contain other nodes.
Gets the node immediately following this node.
Gets the type of this node.
Gets the immediate parent of this node.

detaileddescription.para: If a node has just been created and not yet added to the tree, or if it has been removed from the tree, the parent is null.

briefdescription.para: Gets the node immediately preceding this node.
Returns a Range object that represents the portion of a document that is contained in this node.
Gets the first ancestor of the specified NodeType.
Gets the text of this node and of all its children.

detaileddescription.para: The returned string includes all control and special characters as described in ControlChar.

briefdescription.para: Gets next node according to the pre-order tree traversal algorithm.
Gets the previous node according to the pre-order tree traversal algorithm.
Removes itself from the parent.
Setter for Aspose::Words::Node::get_CustomNodeId.
Exports the content of the node into a string in the specified format.
Exports the content of the node into a string using the specified save options.
A utility method that converts a node type enum value into a user friendly string.
Base class for all nodes of a Word document.

detaileddescription.para: A document is represented as a tree of nodes, similar to DOM or XmlDocument.
For more info see the Composite design pattern.
The Node class:

listitem.para: Defines the interface for visiting nodes.
Implements parent node and owner document mechanisms.
